text: A dire shortage of protective gear for medical workers has hit the U.S. again, affecting a broad array of procedures separate from the virus https://t.co/RDWQMymXWF

text:
RT @allyson_renee7: A California mom has sued her former employer, alleging she was fired while working from home during the pandemic because her boss did not like that her kids could be heard on business calls.
